description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(40).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,38,0,-1).
mathematica: Table[Numerator[FromContinuedFraction[ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[40],n]]],{n,1,50}] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Mar 21 2011*)Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[40], 30]] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 29 2013 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
